cards.title: Blitz
setup: Put {BlitzCharacter}'s character cards into play [i]Friday Night Lightning[/i] side up. Shuffle the villain deck. Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Circuit is revealed. Put it into play. Shuffle the remaining cards into the deck.
gameplay: Lightning damage cannot have its type changed. Lightning damage dealt to {BlitzCharacter} is irreducible.
When a target other than {BlitzCharacter} would be dealt lightning damage by a source other than {BlitzCharacter}, 1 player discards a card or that damage is redirected to {BlitzCharacter}.
When {BlitzCharacter} is dealt lightning damage, increase the next lightning damage dealt by {BlitzCharacter} by X minus 1, where X = the damage taken.
At the end of the villain turn, if there are no villain Circuit cards in play, flip this card. Otherwise, the environment deals {BlitzCharacter} 3 lightning damage.
flippedGameplay: Lightning damage cannot have its type changed. Lightning damage dealt to {BlitzCharacter} is irreducible.
When a target other than {BlitzCharacter} would be dealt lightning damage by a source other than {BlitzCharacter}, 1 player discards a card or that damage is redirected to {BlitzCharacter}.
When {BlitzCharacter} is dealt lightning damage, increase the next lightning damage dealt by {BlitzCharacter} by X minus 1, where X = the damage taken.
At the end of the villain turn, if there is at least 1 villain Circuit in play, flip this card.

At the end of the villain turn, the environment deals {BlitzCharacter} 3 lightning damage, then {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H + 1} melee damage and plays the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn, {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} melee damage.
challengeText: At the end of the villain turn, discard the top card of the villain deck. If Power Source is discarded this way, put it into play.

openingLines.default: More phonies, huh? Time for some necessary roughness!
openingLines.VainFacadePlaytest.SphereCharacter: Game on! Time to show the world what a fake you are.
openingLines.VainFacadePlaytest.NodeCharacter: Hey cap! Your odds of winnin' don't look too good.

cards.title: Arc Projector
body: When {BlitzCharacter} is dealt lightning damage, put 1 card from the villain trash beneath this card for each point of damage dealt.

At the end of the villain turn, {BlitzCharacter} deals the X hero targets with the highest HP {H - 2} lightning damage, where X = the number of cards beneath this card. Then, discard a card from under this card for each time damage was dealt this way.

cards.title: Calling an Audible
body: Reveal the top {H} cards of the villain deck. Put the first revealed One-Shot and the first revealed Playbook into play. Discard the other revealed cards.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“I'll give you a choice: you run{BR}out in front of them cameras yellin' that{BR}Blitz stole all your jewels, or I'm gonna{BR}fold you into a pretzel right here.”{BR}{BR}-Blitz, Sphere: Fallen Hero #3

cards.title: EM-Charge Stabilizer
body: Increase lightning damage dealt by 1.
When {BlitzCharacter} is dealt lightning damage, he regains 3 HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 lightning damage.

cards.title: Fired Up
body: When this card enters play, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Circuit is revealed. Put it into play. Discard the other revealed cards.
The first time each turn {BlitzCharacter} is dealt damage by a target other than {BlitzCharacter}, he deals the source of that damage 3 lightning damage.
At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Just try to relax! {zap} We'll take{BR}care of this! {zap}

cards.title: Go Long
body: {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 1} lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You look shocked. Didn't see{BR}that comin'?

cards.title: Instant Replay
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Playbooks.
When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.
The first time each turn {BlitzCharacter} deals a target other than himself damage, {BlitzCharacter} deals that target 2 melee and 2 lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Yeah, Sphere, [b]I'm[/b] the bad{BR}one. Why's nobody ever come{BR}back from the future t'kill [b]me?[/b]

cards.title: Offsides
body: Destroy all non-character non-villain cards in the villain play area. {BlitzCharacter} deals each hero target X plus 1 lightning damage, where X = the number of cards destroyed in this way.

flavorQuotes.text: {You could have been{BR}a hero. He didn't make you{BR}a villain.} {scream}

cards.title: Personal Foul
body: {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H + 1} lightning damage. Destroy {H - 2} hero Ongoing and/or Equipment cards.
cards.flavorReference: Blitz, Fury: Sins of the Siblings #12

cards.title: Power Source
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals {BlitzCharacter} {H} lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Arrrgggh! I [b]hate[/b] power{BR}lines! Soon y'all gon' hate 'em as{BR}much as me!

cards.title: Pulse Modulator
body: When {BlitzCharacter} is dealt lightning damage, move a card from the top of the villain deck beneath this card for each point of damage dealt this way.
At the start of the villain turn, shuffle the cards beneath this one and discard cards from under this card until a One-Shot is discarded. If a One-Shot is discarded this way, put it into play.

flavorQuotes.text: Why'd I need fire in my blood when{BR}I'm ridin' lightnin'?

cards.flavorReference: Blitz, Strange Stories: The Midnight Bazaar #21

cards.title: Recharge
body: When {BlitzCharacter} is dealt lightning damage, he regains the same amount of HP.{BR}Then, he regains 5 HP. If he did not regain HP this way, increase the next lightning damage dealt by {BlitzCharacter} by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 irreducible lightning damage. If no damage is dealt this way, each player destroys 1 of their Ongoings.

flavorQuotes.text: You may have stolen thunder, Mr. Solomon,{BR}but the storm is coming all the same. You{BR}would do well to remember that fact.

cards.flavorReference: The Whisper Scribe, Strange Stories: The Midnight Bazaar #19

cards.title: Rushing
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Playbooks.
When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.
The first time each turn {BlitzCharacter} deals a hero target lightning damage, {H - 2} players discard a card, then play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Put up or shut up, mascot-man.

cards.title: Sweep Right
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Playbooks. When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.
The first time {BlitzCharacter} is dealt damage each turn, 1 player discards a card.
The first time {BlitzCharacter} would deal damage to a target other than {BlitzCharacter} each turn, redirect that damage to the hero target with the second lowest HP.

flavorQuotes.text: He's past the line of scrimmage!{BR}He. Could. Go. All. The. Way!

cards.flavorReference: Blitz, Blitz: First and Ten One-Shot

cards.title: Too Many Men on the Field
body: {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the highest HP X melee damage, where X = the number of hero targets in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Got no time for y'all. Stay{BR}down.

cards.title: Unnecessary Roughness
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Playbooks.
When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.

At the end of the villain turn, destroy 1 environment card and {H - 2} hero Ongoing and/or Equipment cards. For each card destroyed this way, increase the next lightning damage dealt by {BlitzCharacter} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: You're out-of-bounds, old man.{BR}I don't wanna kill Sphere. Not 'til the{BR}whole world sees what a fake he is.

cards.title: Unsportsmanlike Conduct
body: {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 1} melee damage and {H - 1} lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You don't fool me. You're team captain.{BR}Enjoy the bench.

cards.flavorReference: Blitz to Node, Y-Tech Laboratories: Power Surge One-Shot

cards.title: Up the Middle
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Playbooks.
When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, {BlitzCharacter} deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H - 2} melee damage and {H - 2} lightning damage.
